### **About Myself**

My name is Yijia (Christiana) Liu. I am a genetic epidemiology student at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. My research interests are in genetics and Autism Spectrum Disorder. I am excited to meet you. In my free time, I like playing the cello, piano, making music and ski.

### **Education**

**MHS in Genetic Epidemiology** (2023-2024)\| Johns Hopkins University

**BA in Cognitive Science and Public Health Studies** (2020-2023)\| Johns Hopkins University
